title: Aníbal Fernández facts for kids
snippet: He was the Minister of Production, Interior Minister, and Minister of Justice. He also served as the President's Cabinet Chief. ... Aníbal Fernández was born in Quilmes, a city in Buenos Aires Province, Argentina.

title: Aníbal Fernández | AS/COA
snippet: Chief of the Cabinet of Ministers and Candidate for Governor of the Province of Buenos Aires (Frente para la Victoria) Aníbal Fernández is a candidate for governor of the Province of Buenos Aires and currently chief of staff of the Minister’s Cabinet for the presidency.

title: Argentina’s President Alberto Fernandez reshuffles cabinet after political crisis
snippet: Juan Manzur, governor of Tucuman ... over as chief of staff from Santiago Cafiero, one of Kirchner’s most controversial officials, the presidency announced.
